channel.title: Dev on Random thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Dev on Random thoughts

item.title: Programming Languages in 15 years
item.description: This is a post that I wanted to write for a long time. The idea is to imagine how popular todays’ most popular programming languages will be in 15 years. 15 years was chosen because it is quite a nice period of time: 10 years would be too soon so that the programming landscape wouldn’t change too much from what it is nowadays. 20 years is too long of a period to make any kind of precise foresight.
